article: "Imagine you are walking along the road. Suddenly you fall over and all the passers-by burst into laughter. You feel very  _  and think the world is laughing at you . We should do  _  to make things better. I used to be a(n)  _  girl and not very good at maths. And to everyone's  _  , I succeeded! The teacher smiled and said, "Well done! I  _  you could do it!" Since then, I have become active in maths as  _  as in other subjects.
